name: PODCAST VS VIEWER 《主观争霸》&《主播vs观众》
name_original: PODCAST VS VIEWER 《主观争霸》&《主播vs观众》
description:
The game is an auxiliary software game tool specially created for the podcasts and podcast viewer fans playing online live broadcast on major live broadcast platforms in minutes, integrating interactive communication and gameplay.
The main gameplay of the game is to interact with the podcaster and the viewer to report numbers and the podcaster controls and clicks on the number slots of themselves and the viewer to compete in the game. The viewer rounds to the number by sending numbers to the podcaster in the chat comment area of ​​the live broadcast software on the live broadcast platform, so that the podcaster can manually perform the game number for the audience when the viewer takes turns, so as to interact with the game.
At the same time, the game also provides message and chat boxes to facilitate podcasters and viewers to leave messages and chat. There is no need to switch to the chat area of ​​the live broadcast platform to type every time, preventing podcast replies from being overwhelmed by viewer replies in the comment area.
developers: Two Thousand and one entertainment studios
publishers: Two Thousand and one entertainment studios
